name: 10seconds2Mars
description:
10sec2Mars

Game prototype for TKgames gamejam

Land gently on a planet without getting crashed by astreoids and debris.

Controls:

arrow up - accelerate

arrlow left/right - rotation

Authors:

Piotr Masek: programming, game design, level design

Jakub Pułka: 2d artist, game design, level design

Used 3rd party assets:

http://www.dafont.com/lcd-lcd-mono.font

https://www.assetstore.unity3d.com/en/#!/content/25142
